```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

CREATE, short for Cre recombination-based AAV targeted evolution, that enables the development of AAV capsids that more efficiently transduce defined Cre-expression cell populations *in vivo*.
